> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift's fur is a complete fluff, as he covers his eyes with his paws,
> then slowly uncovering them.
>
> "MAAAAN, I JUST LOST EIGHT OF MY NINE LIVES BACK THERE! And I never get
> scared, but THAT scared me!"

<NEW>

WOLFGANG chuckled as he looked back at the tower, fire and smoke was
still rising from its upper layer. "You?" He said as he came up to
clap NIGHTSHIFT on the back. "I think I lost several myself." He
shrugged casually. "That is if I had any lives to loose."

PROWL came flying from the tower as well still in his avian mode, his
wings flapping quickly to keep himself aloft in the cold artic air.
Although he was covered in soot and dust he looked okay, "That was a
little bigger bang than I had accounted for."

The group was standing on the small island that the tower stood on,
all of it surrounded by a large and nearly frozen lake, which was in
turn surrounded by the hills and mountains.

Sitting in the water was a makeshift craft made out of wood and other
debris.  RAMULUS was already on board checking over the craft checking
if it had suffered any damage.

Meanwhile POLAR CLAW was looking skyward. "Look!" He called out as he
pointed to the tower.

From the tower smoke still poured out and fire was errupting from it
and the remains of the framework that was still left of its uppermost
storey. However coming out of the fire there were small motes of light
looking something like embers at first, perhaps burning pieces of of
the building structure, but then they began to move and fly.

Upwards they moved, higher and higher into the skies they continued
until they at last faded from sight, seeming to move up past the
clouds.

(TAG)

- Preston
